#include <p18f4450.h>
#include <delays.h>

#pragma config FOSC = HS
#pragma config WDT = OFF
#pragma config MCLRE = OFF

#define BT00	PORTAbits.RA0
#define BT01	PORTAbits.RA1
#define LED00 	PORTAbits.RA2
#define LED01	PORTAbits.RA3

void delay_ms(unsigned int tempo){
   while(tempo > 0){
      Delay100TCYx(10);
      tempo--;
      }
   }
   
void delay_bounce(){
   delay_ms(30);
   }

void main(){ 
   PORTA = 0x00; LATA = 0x00; TRISA = 0x03;
   ADCON1 = 0x0F;
   
   while (1){
      
      if(BT00 && BT01){
	 LED00 = 1;
	 LED01 = 1;
      }
      
      if(!BT00 && !BT01){
	 LED00 = 0;
	 LED01 = 0;
      }   
      delay_bounce();
   }
 }
